item.description:
I've reserved the Screening room at 360 State Street for another Movie Night!  You can see a film for free at this time and location.  NO "maybe" RSVP's.

I will need  FULL NAMES (and that of any +1) for the Concierge to let in. Please Provide as asked when you RSVP. (You can also Event Comment, Email, or Text me.)

If you have any questions, PLEASE see the 360 Movie Nights FAQ posted on the message board and linked here.  Many of them (snacks, No Show Policy, ect.) are discussed there.

Seats are Limited, so please only RSVP if you're going to come, and change accordingly if something comes up.

This Events Film Is...

Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

(2004 - Drama / Romance / Sci-Fi - 108 minutes - Rated R)

IMDB Description: A couple undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memories when their relationship turns sour, but it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.

Staring: Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Tom Wilkinson

Also Has: Elijah Wood, Mark Ruffalo, Kirsten Dunst

AJ's Comments:  Rotten Tomatoes rates as 93% Fresh, Roger Ebert gave 3.5 Stars.  This is actually one of my favorite "Valentine's Day" Movies, if not my favorite.  It's not super lovey-dovy and it has deeper more cerebral concepts.  Many would argue that it's box office draw was a bit on the low side for how good the movie is, since it was one of Jim Carrey's earlier "Non-Wacky" performances.  (The film does have humor, just not his at the time typical style from films like The Mask or Ace Ventura, slightly more serious role.)

Event start time is 7:00 for the social portion, so you can start showing up then but please no earlier. We will not start the film until 7:30 or shortly there after, but don't plan to be any later.  (There are now restrictions on room time.)

Feel free to use the waiting list. If someone else backs out you can be automatically added, just provide your full name for the concierge as a contingency.  (I recommend RSVPing individually rather than using +1's if wait-listing.)
item.how_to_find_us: Ring the Bell Button or Call the concierge on the cell phone number on the door, they will Direct you. If you have added problems, call AJ at 315-345-9348.
item.name: 360 Movie: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
